name: Tortoise Island
description:
Game made for No More Sweden 2018

Theme:

"A tortoise that lives a long time"

"Manned T-shirt"

"Giraffe"

A kid wakes up on a deserted island. Lost and all alone he finds company with a tortoise living on the island. The tortoise is wise and helps him on his journey through life.

Go round the island and interact with objects to progress.

Use Left arrow or A button to go forward. Use shift or space to interact.

Credz to:

"Music Maker"
